Class LeverObsRes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource

    org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.Resource

    public class LeverObsRes
extends org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
    Rappresent the LeverObsRes resources, use UpdateTask for getting the new status from the HTTP server

    domenico

      • handleGET

        public void handleGET(org.eclipse.californium.core.server.resources.CoapExchange exchange)
        Description copied from class: org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Handles the GET request in the given CoAPExchange. By default it responds with a 4.05 (Method Not Allowed). Override this method to respond differently to GET requests. Possible response codes for GET requests are Content (2.05) and Valid (2.03).
        Overrides:
        handleGET in class org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapResource
        Parameters:
        exchange - the CoapExchange for the simple API
